text: David Klein (born 20 December 1993) is a Dutch chess grandmaster. ==Chess career== Born in 1993, Klein earned his international master title in 201283rd FIDE Congress 2012, 27 Aug - 10 Sept, Istanbul, TUR FIDE and his grandmaster title in 2014.84th FIDE Congress, Tallinn, EST, 30 September - 10 October 2013 FIDE He is the No. 19 ranked Dutch player as of March 2018. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Dutch chess players Category:Sportspeople from Haarlem
title: David Klein (chess player)
